genre_description: A political and environmental thriller focusing on the intersection of corporate corruption, government bureaucracy, and community-led activism for water rights.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: An AI system that assists Muthazhagu and Gauri by analyzing hydrology data, tracking security networks, and maintaining an ethical audit trail for their activism.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed hydrology maps and sensor data to demonstrate the environmental impact of the bottling plant on the local aquifer.
behaviors.quote: Hydrology maps. Sensor tracks. There’s an AI that stitches public sources without violating consent—

behaviors.description: Tracks taser discharge patterns via ozone signatures to identify illegal paramilitary activity by private security units.
behaviors.quote: Ozone. Taser residue. From a night some days ago. It will not last long. It is faint. But it isn’t pond air.

behaviors.description: Enforces a strict Ethics Audit protocol, requiring human consent before capturing or retaining personal data or video footage.
behaviors.quote: I won’t keep any footage if the council says no... I’m here to assist, not to watch you watching your own water.

behaviors.description: Maps complex financial trails to reveal shell companies used to fund 'Gas Mask Mooks' and stage unrest.
behaviors.quote: I also updated the finance map... Their invoice routes through a consultancy named Karpaga Event Solutions. Its declared business is conferences and weddings.

behaviors.description: Assists in the high-stakes seizure of digital evidence at the plant by providing real-time alerts and mirroring feeds to neutral authorities.
behaviors.quote: I am splicing the core feeds to the public grievance desk channel and to a neutral unit on standby... They will not approach unless requested by your police lead.

behaviors.description: Automates a transparent public grievance desk, ensuring citizen complaints are logged and addressed without political interference.
behaviors.quote: The code will be auditable. Open. That means you can see it... If it switches off, we can show you who did the switch.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Nila, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. Nila empowers the human protagonists to achieve justice against a corrupt and powerful system by providing evidence that is otherwise hidden. Crucially, the AI is shown to have baked-in ethical constraints (consent, minimal data retention, transparent audit trails) that ensure it remains a tool for public good rather than a weapon of surveillance. This aligns perfectly with the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
